action.action-desc: Mrs. Bono Mack (for herself and Mr. Butterfield) introduced the following bill; which was referred to the Committee on Energy and Commerce
Additional sponsors: Mr. Bass of New Hampshire, Mr. Dingell, Mr. Upton, Mr. Waxman, and Mr. Barton of Texas
Committed to the Committee of the Whole House on the State of the Union and ordered to be printed

form.official-title: To extend the Undertaking Spam, Spyware, And Fraud Enforcement With Enforcers beyond Borders Act of 2006, and for other purposes.

section.header: Extension of the U.S. SAFE WEB ACT of 2006
section.text: Section 13 of the U.S. SAFE WEB Act of 2006 (Public Law 109–455; 15 U.S.C. 44 note) is amended to read as follows:

Effective September 30, 2020, this Act, and the amendments made by this Act, are repealed, and any provision of law amended by this Act shall be amended to read as if this Act had not been enacted into law.

endorsement.action-desc: Committed to the Committee of the Whole House on the State of the Union and ordered to be printed
